resource_dependency.studentDashboardDataSchema: Database tables required: users(id, email, password_hash, role='student'), student_profiles(student_id, full_name, university, major, year, resume_url)
resource_dependency.companyDashboardDataSchema: Database tables required: users(id, email, password_hash, role='company'), company_profiles(company_id, company_name, industry, description, logo_url, contact_email)

function: Provide authentication and role-based access control for student and company users.
static_description: Login and signup forms with fields defined in loginFormFields and signupFormFields respectively. Displays appropriate dashboard after successful login based on user role.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' submits credentials and redirects to respective dashboards. Clicking 'Sign Up' toggles between login and registration views.
Submitting the form validates inputs and authenticates against backend API.

resource_dependency.browseInternshipsAPISchema: API endpoint returning internship listings filtered by query parameters such as location, duration, stipend_min, industry

function: Allow students to browse and filter available internships.
static_description: Grid layout displaying internship cards with details from internshipListingCardFields. Above the grid, display filter controls from searchFilters.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on an internship card navigates to its detailed view. Clicking 'Apply' opens the application modal.
Changing filters updates the displayed internship list via API call.

resource_dependency.submitApplicationAPI: POST /api/applications with multipart/form-data containing cover letter and resume file

function: Enable students to submit applications for internships.
static_description: Modal or dedicated page showing applicationFormFields including a text area for cover letter and upload field for resume.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Submit Application' sends form data to submitApplicationAPI.
Uploading a file populates the resume field before submission.

resource_dependency.manageInternshipAPISchema: CRUD endpoints under /api/internships requiring company authentication

function: Allow companies to create, update, and delete internship postings.
static_description: Form with fields listed in postInternshipFormFields allowing companies to enter internship details.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Post Internship' creates a new listing via API. Edit/Delete buttons modify existing entries.
Submitting the form saves changes through manageInternshipAPISchema.

function: Display and allow editing of user profile information for both roles.
static_description: Profile pages showing read-only fields from profileViewFieldsStudent or profileViewFieldsCompany depending on user role. An 'Edit Profile' button switches to editable mode using corresponding edit fields.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Edit Profile' enables modification of profile data. Saving updates the database record.
Uploading files replaces current resume/logo previews.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignMediaQueries: @media queries targeting mobile, tablet, desktop breakpoints
resource_dependency.performanceOptimizationAssets: Minified CSS bundle, lazy-loaded images, preloaded critical assets

function: Ensure consistent experience across devices while maintaining fast load times.
static_description: Site uses responsiveDesignMediaQueries to adapt layouts and components. All stylesheets and scripts optimized per performanceOptimizationAssets.

interaction_and_states.description: Resizing browser window adjusts layout according to media queries without reloading.
Lazy loading triggers image/content rendering only when scrolled into viewport.

resource_dependency.menuVisibilityLogic: Menu items visibility determined by authenticated user role

function: Provide easy navigation between key areas of the platform.
static_description: Fixed-position top navigation bar listing menu items from navigationMenuItems. Visibility adjusted based on logged-in status and role.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any menu item navigates to the associated section. Logout clears session and returns to homepage.
Hovering over menu reveals sub-options if applicable (e.g., profile dropdown).

resource_dependency.databaseConnectionConfig: Uses environment variables DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME to connect to PostgreSQL instance

function: Serve all frontend data dynamically through RESTful APIs connected to PostgreSQL.
static_description: Backend exposes dynamicDataEndpoints which handle requests/responses formatted as JSON objects. Database connection established using databaseConnectionConfig values.

resource_dependency.fetchInternshipsFunction: JavaScript function calling GET /api/internships with optional query params

function: Fetch all dynamic content exclusively through backend API calls.
static_description: Each frontend component utilizes functions like fetchInternshipsFunction and fetchUserProfileFunction to populate content upon mount or trigger events.

interaction_and_states.description: Component initialization triggers relevant fetch function to retrieve data.
Manual refresh re-fetches latest data ensuring up-to-date UI state.

resource_dependency.pgClientLibrary: Node.js pg library used for connecting to PostgreSQL database

function: Establish secure connection to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables.
static_description: Server configuration loads postgresEnvVars at startup and initializes pgClientLibrary with those settings to enable database operations.

resource_dependency.packageJsonScripts: { "install:all": "concurrently \"npm install\" \"cd client && npm install\" \"cd server && npm install\"", "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev --prefix client\" \"npm run dev --prefix server\"" }

function: Configure monorepo-style development workflow with unified commands.
static_description: Root level package.json includes scripts defined in packageJsonScripts enabling simultaneous installation and execution of frontend/backend services.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing `npm run install:all` installs dependencies for entire project. Running `npm run dev` starts both client and server in watch mode.

function: Apply consistent background color theme site-wide.
static_description: Entire website body styled with backgroundColorStyle ensuring uniformity across all pages and components.

function: Implement cohesive teal-themed styling for all interactive elements.
static_description: All UI components utilize tealColorPalette in their designs as specified in uiComponentStylesheet.

interaction_and_states.description: Buttons and interactive elements darken slightly within tealColorPalette range during hover state.

resource_dependency.rbacMiddlewareLogic: Express middleware checking JWT token payload for 'role' claim matching route permissions

function: Enforce access restrictions preventing unauthorized navigation between panels.
static_description: Protected routes validate incoming requests using rbacMiddlewareLogic to ensure proper authorization before serving protected resources.

interaction_and_states.description: Unauthorized attempts to access restricted routes redirect to login or show forbidden error message.
